programme.title: Saint Malo (Sn 4 Ep 1)
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A police captain returns to her hometown in Saint Malo, France to work on a case evoking pirate legends. French with English subtitles.

programme.desc: Elisabeth and Paul team up again when a dead body is discovered on a beach in Martigues.

programme.desc: A statue of Saint Therese is used to conceal the body of a murdered young woman.
